title: 10/06/22: Emprez maintenance on October 12 from midnight to 7am
content: Dear clients,Emprez will be unavailable on Wednesday, October 12 from midnight to 7 a.m. for maintenance.During this period, employees will be able to punch, however, the management of schedules, timesheet and payroll will not work during this period.Thank you for your understanding,The Emprez TeamHelpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
